public-liked-songs.title: Public "Liked Songs" Playlist
public-liked-songs.desc:
Creates a public paylist that contains all your liked songs. Then updates that playlist every day.
This allows your people who follow you to see and play your liked songs.

duplicate-remover.title: Duplicate Remover
duplicate-remover.desc:
Scans through a playlist and finds any possible duplicates.
Then removes the duplicates you select.
